reviewText: yes i would recommend it going to buy the bigger blackhawk box set hopefully very soon cant wait to watch it .
Title: NHL Stanley Cup Champions 2010: Chicago Blackhawks

reviewText: Told the story of this great run to a Stanley Cup Championship which had eluded this great team for 49 years. Really thoroughly  enjoyed all the events portrayed.
Title: NHL Stanley Cup Champions 2010: Chicago Blackhawks

reviewText: I remember exactly where I was on this day, one of the best days of my life.  Hockey has never left Chicago, but it has definitely come back.
summary: Relive the day they earned their feathers
Title: NHL Stanley Cup Champions 2010: Chicago Blackhawks

reviewText: A great finale to a terrific season is captured in this dvd.  It is awelcome tribute to all long suffering Chicago hockey fans. The excitementprovided by the 2010 Blackhawk team rivaled the Chicago Bear Super Bowlteam of 1985.  This dvd reflected the highs and lows of the past season.Very highly recommended for all hockey fans in Chicago.
Title: NHL Stanley Cup Champions 2010: Chicago Blackhawks

reviewText: i guess all the negative reviewers don't love the blackhawks like i do!! :) but this dvd collection is great!! i would've like to have had the 2 games in the finals that the flyers won, but if you love the blackhawks like i do, having 5 great games is beyond a bargain!!  i sure hope it won't take another 50 years for the hawks to win again!! :) but i keep watching these games over and over, cuz what blackhawks fan doesn't want to see their guys kick the other team's ***??  never mind the bad reviews, this dvd collection is great!!
summary: i gotta disagree with all the other negative reviews!!!
Title: NHL Stanley Cup Champions 2010: Chicago Blackhawks
